documents.document: "Don't count the days, make the days count." - Muhammad Ali
"You are what you think about all day long." - Dr. Robert Schuller
"It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else." - Erma Bombeck
"Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose." - Bill Gates
"It is wise to keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final." - Roger Babson
"It is better to ask some of the questions than know all the answers." - James Thurber
"Strength lies in differences, not in similarities." - Stephen Covey
"Open your arms to change, but don't let go of your values." - Dalai Lama
"Do more than believe: practice." - William Arthur Ward
"Your big opportunity may be right where you are standing right now." - Napoleon Hill
"If we wait for the moment when everything, absolutely everything is ready, we shall never begin." - Ivan Turgenev
"We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey." - Kenji Miyazawa
"Well done is better than well said." - Benjamin Franklin
"The roots of true achievement lie in the will to become the best that you can become." - Harold Taylor
"Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing." - Napoleon Hill
"Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." - Theodore Roosevelt
"Make things as simple as possible, but not simpler." - Albert Einstein
"We shall have no better conditions in the future if we are satisfied with all those which we have at present." - Thomas Edison
"The most important thing about having goals is having one." - Geoffrey F. Abert
"Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success." - Charles F. Kettering
"To think is easy. To act is hard. But the hardest thing in the world is to act in accordance with your thinking." - Johann von Goethe
"Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined." - Henry David Thoreau
"Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished." - Lao Tzu
"Most people are paralyzed by fear. Overcome it and you take charge of your life and your world." - Mark Victor Hansen
"You really can change the world if you care enough." - Marian Wright Edelman
"I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious." - Albert Einstein.
"It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." - Shakespeare
"The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them." - Benjamin Jowett
"If you can't get rid of the skeleton in your closet, you'd best teach it to dance." - George Bernard Shaw
"Formal education will make you a living. Self education will make you a fortune." - Jim Rohn
"If you have time to whine and complain about something then you have the time to do something about it." - Anthony J. D'Angelo
"I hated every minute of training, but I said, don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion." - Muhammad Ali
"Doubt can only be removed by action." - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
"No great discovery was ever made without a bold guess." - Isaac Newton
"We learn by doing." - Aristotle
"I'd rather regret the things that I have done than the things that I have not done." - Lucille Ball
"To lead the people, walk behind them." - Lao Tzu
"You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late." - Ralph Waldo Emerson
"Necessity is the mother of taking chances." - Mark Twain ac
"Every day holds the possibility of a miracle." - Elizabeth David
"Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity." - Og Mandino
"Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it." - Henry David Thoreau
"Example is not the main thing in influencing others, it is the only thing." - Albert Schweitzer
"If I have seen farther than others, it is because I have stood on the shoulders of giants." - Isaac Newton
"A life spent making mistakes is not only more honourable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing." - George Bernard Shaw
"The power of intuitive understanding will protect you from harm until the end of your days." - Lao Tsu
"We can throw stones, complain about them, stumble on them, climb over them, or build with them." - William Arthur Ward
"Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving." - Henry Ford
"Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else." - Les Brown
"The sound body is the product of the sound mind." - George Bernard Shaw
"The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang." - Mary Kay Ash
"Common sense is not so common." - Voltaire
"When it is dark enough, you can see the stars." - Ralph Waldo Emerson
"The less you open your heart to others, the more your heart suffers." - Deepak Chopra
"Better to keep your mouth shut and appear stupid than to open it and remove all doubt." - Mark Twain
"If you're going through hell, keep going." - Winston Churchill
"Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can." - Richard Bach
"We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give." - Winston Churchill
"It's lack of faith that makes people afraid of meeting challenges, and I believe in myself." - Muhammad Ali
"Great discoveries and improvements invariably involve the cooperation of many minds." - Alexander Graham Bell
"It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going." - Brian Tracy
"Without danger you cannot get beyond danger." - George Herbert
"When all is said and done, success without happiness is the worst kind of failure." - Louis Binstock
"There is no substitute for hard work." - Thomas Edison
"Ideas not coupled with action never become bigger than the brain cells they occupied." - Arnold H. Glasow
"Genius without education is like silver in the mine." - Benjamin Franklin
"Take time for all things: great haste makes great waste." - Benjamin Franklin
"Love without action is meaningless and action without love is irrelevant." - Deepak Chopra
"While we stop to think, we often miss our opportunity." - Publilius Syrus
"Some people grumble because roses have thorns; I am thankful that the thorns have roses." - Alphonse Karr
"You can adopt the attitude there is nothing you can do, or you can see the challenge as your call to action." - Catherine Pulsifer
"I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known." - Walt Disney
"When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be." - Lao Tsu
"No great man ever complains of want of opportunity." - Ralph Waldo Emerson
"All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers." - Orison Swett Marden
"At first dreams seem impossible, then improbable, then inevitable." - Christopher Reeve
"If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude. Don't complain." - Maya Angelou
"Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble." - John Madden
"Enjoy your achievements as well as your plans." - Max Ehrmann
"He who would travel happily must travel light." - Antoine de Saint-Exupery
"Snowflakes are one of nature's most fragile things, but just look at what they can do when they stick together." - Vesta Kelly
"The more original a discovery, the more obvious it seems afterward." - Arthur Koestler
"The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender." - Vince Lombardi
"You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore." - Christopher Columbus
"Progress is impossible without change and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." - George Bernard Shaw
"Wealth is the ability to fully experience life." - Henry David Thoreau
"Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort." - John Ruskin
"What is defeat? Nothing but education; nothing but the first step to something better." - Wendell Phillips
"Failure is impossible." - Susan B. Anthony
"You are today where your thoughts have brought you; you will be tomorrow where your thoughts take you." - James Allen
"You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus." - Mark Twain
"Stop worrying about the potholes in the road and enjoy the journey." - Babs Hoffman
"Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall." - Confucius
"A man is literally what he thinks." - James Allen
"A danger foreseen is half avoided." - Thomas Fuller
"Finding a way to live the simple life today is man's most complicated task." - Henry A. Courtney
"Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream." - Kahlil Gibran
"In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity." - Albert Einstein
"Everyone needs to be valued. Everyone has the potential to give something back." - Diana Princess of Wales
"Things do not happen. Things are made to happen." - John F Kennedy
